sqlMap.select: SELECT 'PRIMARY' as reportingLevel, ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, PRIM.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, PRIM.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, PRIM.VERSION as version, PRIM.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, PRIM.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, PRIM.SUBJECT as subject, PRIM.GRADE as grade, PRIM.SAMPLE as sample, PRIM.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, PRIM.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, PRIM.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, PRIM.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, PRIM.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, PRIM.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, PRIM.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, PRIM.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, PRIM.CREATED_BY as createdBy, PRIM.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, PRIM.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, PRIM.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, PRIM.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, PRIM.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, PRIM.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, PRIM.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, PRIM.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, PRIM.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET PRIM, ITEM_SET_ITEM PISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR PISIP, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY PISC, ITEM_SET SUB, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, PRODUCT PROD, ITEM WHERE SUB.ITEM_SET_ID = #subtestId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = PISI.ITEM_ID AND PISIP.ITEM_SET_ID = PISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND PISIP.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID = PRIM.ITEM_SET_ID AND PRIM.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = PISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND PISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = PROD.SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL AND PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID = PISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUB.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') UNION SELECT 'SECONDARY' as reportingLevel, ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, SEC.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, SEC.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, SEC.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, SEC.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, SEC.VERSION as version, SEC.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, SEC.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, SEC.SUBJECT as subject, SEC.GRADE as grade, SEC.SAMPLE as sample, SEC.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, SEC.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, SEC.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, SEC.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, SEC.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, SEC.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, SEC.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, SEC.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, SEC.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, SEC.CREATED_BY as createdBy, SEC.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, SEC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, SEC.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, SEC.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, SEC.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, SEC.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, SEC.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, SEC.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, SEC.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET SEC, ITEM_SET_ITEM SISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR SISIP, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY SISC, ITEM_SET SUB, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, PRODUCT PROD, ITEM WHERE SUB.ITEM_SET_ID = #subtestId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = SISI.ITEM_ID AND SISIP.ITEM_SET_ID = SISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND SISIP.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID = SEC.ITEM_SET_ID AND SEC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = SISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND SISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = PROD.SEC_SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL AND PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID = SISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUB.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') ORDER BY itemId, reportingLevel

SELECT OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, REPORTING_ISET.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, REPORTING_ISET.VERSION as version, REPORTING_ISET.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, REPORTING_ISET.SUBJECT as subject, REPORTING_ISET.GRADE as grade, REPORTING_ISET.SAMPLE as sample, REPORTING_ISET.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, REPORTING_ISET.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, REPORTING_ISET.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, REPORTING_ISET.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, REPORTING_ISET.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, REPORTING_ISET.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, REPORTING_ISET.CREATED_BY as createdBy, REPORTING_ISET.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, REPORTING_ISET.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, REPORTING_ISET.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, REPORTING_ISET.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, REPORTING_ISET.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, REPORTING_ISET.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, REPORTING_ISET.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET REPORTING_ISET, ITEM_SET SUBTEST_ISET, ITEM_SET_ITEM SUBTEST_ISI, ITEM_SET_ITEM OBJECTIVE_ISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR ISA, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY ISC, PRODUCT PROD, ITEM WHERE PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND ISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID = PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID AND ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = #level:NUMERIC# AND SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = #subtestId:NUMERIC# AND SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'TD' AND SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUBTEST_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID AND OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_ID = SUBTEST_ISI.ITEM_ID AND ISA.ITEM_SET_ID = OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISA.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = ISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND REPORTING_ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'RE' AND OBJECTIVE_ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUBTEST_ISET.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL')

SELECT CONTENT_AREA_LEVEL as contentAreaLevel, SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL as scoringItemSetLevel, SEC_SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL as secondaryScoringItemSetLevel FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC#

SELECT PROD.CONTENT_AREA_LEVEL as contentAreaLevel, PROD.SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL as scoringItemSetLevel, PROD.SEC_SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL as secondaryScoringItemSetLevel FROM PRODUCT PROD, TEST_ROSTER TR, TEST_ADMIN TA WHERE TR.TEST_ROSTER_ID = #testRosterId:NUMERIC# AND TR.TEST_ADMIN_ID = TA.TEST_ADMIN_ID AND TA.PRODUCT_ID = PROD.PRODUCT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT 'PRIMARY' as reportingLevel, ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, PRIM.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, PRIM.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, PRIM.VERSION as version, PRIM.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, PRIM.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, PRIM.SUBJECT as subject, PRIM.GRADE as grade, PRIM.SAMPLE as sample, PRIM.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, PRIM.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, PRIM.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, PRIM.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, PRIM.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, PRIM.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, PRIM.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, PRIM.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, PRIM.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, PRIM.CREATED_BY as createdBy, PRIM.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, PRIM.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, PRIM.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, PRIM.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, PRIM.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, PRIM.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, PRIM.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, PRIM.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, PRIM.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET PRIM, ITEM_SET_ITEM PISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR PISIP, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY PISC, ITEM_SET SUB, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, PRODUCT PROD, ITEM, ITEM_SET ISET, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR ISA, TEST_CATALOG TC, TABE_CCSS_REPORT_LEVEL_MAP TRLM WHERE SUB.ITEM_SET_ID = #subtestId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = PISI.ITEM_ID AND PISIP.ITEM_SET_ID = PISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND PISIP.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID = PRIM.ITEM_SET_ID AND PRIM.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = PISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND PISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = TRLM.SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL AND PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID = PISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUB.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') AND ISA.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISA.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID AND ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'TC' AND TC.ITEM_SET_ID = ISET.ITEM_SET_ID AND TC.ACTIVATION_STATUS = 'AC' AND TRLM.TEST_CATALOG_NAME = TC.TEST_NAME AND TRLM.ACTIVATION_STATUS = 'AC' UNION SELECT DISTINCT 'SECONDARY' as reportingLevel, ISI.ITEM_ID as itemId, SEC.ITEM_SET_ID as itemSetId, SEC.ITEM_SET_TYPE as itemSetType, SEC.ITEM_SET_NAME as itemSetName, SEC.MIN_GRADE as minGrade, SEC.VERSION as version, SEC.MAX_GRADE as maxGrade, SEC.ITEM_SET_LEVEL as itemSetLevel, SEC.SUBJECT as subject, SEC.GRADE as grade, SEC.SAMPLE as sample, SEC.MEDIA_PATH as mediaPath, SEC.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit, SEC.BREAK_TIME as breakTime, SEC.EXT_EMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extEmsItemSetId, SEC.EXT_CMS_ITEM_SET_ID as extCmsItemSetId, SEC.ITEM_SET_DISPLAY_NAME as itemSetDisplayName, SEC.ITEM_SET_DESCRIPTION as itemSetDescription, SEC.ITEM_SET_RULE_ID as itemSetRuleId, SEC.CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, SEC.CREATED_BY as createdBy, SEC.ACTIVATION_STATUS as activationStatus, SEC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID as itemSetCategoryId, SEC.OWNER_CUSTOMER_ID as ownerCustomerId, SEC.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, SEC.UPDATED_DATE_TIME as updatedDateTime, SEC.ITEM_SET_FORM as itemSetForm, SEC.PUBLISH_STATUS as publishStatus, SEC.ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY as originalCreatedBy, SEC.EXT_TST_ITEM_SET_ID as extTstItemSetId FROM ITEM_SET SEC, ITEM_SET_ITEM SISI, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR SISIP, ITEM_SET_CATEGORY SISC, ITEM_SET SUB, ITEM_SET_ITEM ISI, PRODUCT PROD, ITEM, ITEM_SET ISET, ITEM_SET_ANCESTOR ISA, TEST_CATALOG TC, TABE_CCSS_REPORT_LEVEL_MAP TRLM WHERE SUB.ITEM_SET_ID = #subtestId:NUMERIC# AND ISI.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = SISI.ITEM_ID AND SISIP.ITEM_SET_ID = SISI.ITEM_SET_ID AND SISIP.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID = SEC.ITEM_SET_ID AND SEC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID = SISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_ID AND SISC.ITEM_SET_CATEGORY_LEVEL = TRLM.SEC_SCORING_ITEM_SET_LEVEL AND PROD.PRODUCT_ID = #productId:NUMERIC# AND PROD.PARENT_PRODUCT_ID = SISC.FRAMEWORK_PRODUCT_ID AND ISI.ITEM_ID = ITEM.ITEM_ID AND ISI.SUPPRESSED = 'F' AND ITEM.ITEM_TYPE != 'RQ' AND (SUB.item_set_level != 'L' OR PROD.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'TL') AND ISA.ITEM_SET_ID = SUB.ITEM_SET_ID AND ISET.ITEM_SET_ID = ISA.ANCESTOR_ITEM_SET_ID AND ISET.ITEM_SET_TYPE = 'TC' AND TC.ITEM_SET_ID = ISET.ITEM_SET_ID AND TC.ACTIVATION_STATUS = 'AC' AND TRLM.TEST_CATALOG_NAME = TC.TEST_NAME AND TRLM.ACTIVATION_STATUS = 'AC' ORDER BY itemId, reportingLevel
